apikey.description: (Optional) Pass your Client ID if making an unauthenticated request

date.description: "The date for which market hours information is requested. Valid ISO-8601 formats are : yyyy-MM-dd and yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssz."

markets.description: The markets for which you're requesting market hours, comma-separated. Valid markets are EQUITY, OPTION, FUTURE, BOND, or FOREX.
